title: XP left to level up
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Profile Page
custom_expected: THEN a user is able to see how many XP they have to earn to reach the next prestige ranking

title: Total XP
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the profile page

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be able to see player level and prestige ranking
THEN the user should be able to see an XP bar with current progress

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Log in as user 21+
2. Go to profile -> Account -> log in to MLB.com -> update the user's age to under 21
3. Go back to Rally
custom_steps_separated.expected: MGM logo is not displayed on the Games tab and user's position on the leaderboards doesn't have a dollar sign

custom_steps_separated.content:
4. Go back to user's account and update it back to 21+
5. Go back to Rally
custom_steps_separated.expected: MGM logo is displayed on the Games tab and user's position on the leaderboard has a dollar sign

title: Link Layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile tab
custom_expected:
THEN the following links should be displayed and clickable:
- "Submit Feedback" -> https://mlb.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6r71KJ3tWMK4oIt
- "Favorite Team"
- Notifications toggle
- Vibrations toggle
- Account -> takes user to their MLB account page
- "More MLB Apps"
- "More BETMGM apps" -> http://appstore.com/mgmresorts
- "Privacy Policy"
- "Terms and Conditions"
- "FAQ" (link points to non-existent page for now)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26586)

title: Favorite team
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the profile page
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to select their favorite team AND the selected team should be filled with its team color and a blue border

title: Profile Display
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see section at the top of the profile tab with a background color that is determined by the favorite team they have selected
AND that section should contain the logo of their favorite team
AND below that, their name should be displayed
AND below that, their XP rank should be displayed
AND below that, their total XP should be displayed
AND below that, their level and how far they are from the next level should be displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26585)
